sqlQuery.name: IsolateByIsolateId
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct nas.source_id as source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM dots.ExternalNASequence nas WHERE nas.source_id LIKE REPLACE($$isolate_id$$,'*','%')

sqlQuery.name: IsolateByTaxon
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT etn.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM DoTS.source src, DoTS.ExternalNASequence etn WHERE etn.na_sequence_id IN (SELECT sc.na_sequence_id FROM dots.source sc WHERE sc.organism in ('$$isolate_organism$$') ) AND etn.source_id IS NOT NULL AND etn.na_sequence_id = src.na_sequence_id AND src.row_alg_invocation_id > 1000 ORDER BY etn.source_id

sqlQuery.name: IsolateByHost
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT etn.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM DoTS.source src, DoTS.ExternalNASequence etn WHERE etn.na_sequence_id IN (SELECT sc.na_sequence_id FROM dots.source sc WHERE sc.specific_host in ('$$specific_host$$') ) AND etn.source_id IS NOT NULL AND etn.na_sequence_id = src.na_sequence_id AND src.row_alg_invocation_id > 1000 ORDER BY etn.source_id

sqlQuery.name: IsolateByProduct
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT etn.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM DoTS.ExternalNASequence etn, DoTS.GeneFeature gf, DoTS.Transcript trp WHERE gf.na_feature_id = trp.parent_id AND gf.na_sequence_id = etn.na_sequence_id AND trp.product IN ('$$product$$') AND etn.source_id IS NOT NULL AND etn.row_alg_invocation_id > 1000 ORDER BY etn.source_id
